title: curved sans serif / display font
content:
I'm trying to identify the font used in this logo.  
Any help / steer in the right direction is much appreciated.  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308183540im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Protues_Logo_5350.jpg)

Font: 

 Neutraface Text
author: kolbott

comments.content: Mainly because of /e and /s, I'd say it's a custom job based on [HI Neutraface 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308183540/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutra2) Bold.
